topics.title: Check Board Orientation
topics.description: Verify board orientation to ensure correct gyro direction
evidence_quotes: And you'll be surprised that not all manufacturers point the gyro directly at the front the same direction of the arrow as you would think.
So let's go over to the configuration tab and I'll show you where to find this setting.

topics.title: Incorrect Quad Orientation
topics.description: Flash quad to correct orientation or check board setup
evidence_quotes: Another way to get the wrong board orientation is to flash your quad because sometimes when you flash your quad, things don't get applied properly.
So if it doesn't say the right thing, you'll get a flipping quad.

topics.title: Quad Issues
topics.description: Discussion on quad problems and common issues with new Metaflight versions.
evidence_quotes: It does happen. So, go down there and tell me how yours went.
I'd really be interested to know because I see this literally all the time, especially in beginner forums.
Quads are crazy. And they're going to do what they're going to do.
